lost their homes. He replied, "Serves them right for being rich fuckers."

comments.text:
+GunzBlazein180
It's entirely possible that you, as a person, are anonymous. It's also 
possible I could try to find out who you are, if the information is 
available.

The fact you have a name means you are not anonymous here though. You're 
only anonymous if you are "not identified by name", which in this case, you 
are, GunzBlazein180.

I don't know who the person behind the account is, if you're even a person 
(who knows, you might be a dolphin), but I can still link words and actions 
to the name you're using on YouTube.

If you were truly anonymous, I wouldn't have anything to call you.

available and shown/said multiple dozens upon dozens of times across my 
accounts and channel.

Someone who just makes an account with a new username and doesn't link 
themselves to their actual identity can indeed by anonymous, I do not argue 
that. Maybe you'd see that if you stopped being so aggro.

comments.text:
Anonymous is a large group of unlinked yet highly coordinated hackers, 
trolls, and activists originsting from the message board 4chan.
It is debatable when Anonymous actually "formed", though personal 
speculation dictates it was when we all got together from /b/ (a board on 
4chan) and crashed the servers on "Habbo Hotel" after everyone made 
characters with black suits and black afros then crowded and blocked off 
the pools, lobbies, etc while forming into massive swastikas on-screen at 
occasion.
A few years later Anonymous got kind of big and official ahen, once again, 
/b/ raided, this time the church of scientology. Instead of just DDoS'ing 
and pulling LOIC's on their websites and Doxxing officials, people actually 
gathered in person at church of scientology locations, protecting their 
identities with everything ranging from Barney suits to Guy Fawkes masks. 
Ever since whenever Anonymous targets someone things don't end well for 
them. While I do occasionally join in troll raids I mainly support activism 
and explaining to people how messed up our country really is (put briefly, 
it is a corporate-driven fascism run by lobbyist mouthpieces as well as 
unvoted, un-called for officials who spend their time scrutinizing every 
aspect of your life while occasionally looking at hot photos chicks send to 
their boyfriends or planning their next false flag attack to give them 
excuses to tighten security and continue to rip up the constitution while 
the media and society blindly deceives citizens with the illusions of 
freedom and perfection to create a system where the rich constantly get 
richer, the government is sillingly given more and more hold over 
everyone's lives, while the slaves at the bottom known as the common 
citizens or the 99% fail to realize that all of their problems stem from 
the fascist+corrupt as hell government that can be easily overthrown wkth a 
revolution so long as the people join up and open their eyes.)
